structure.unit: ARTICLE XIII. TRAFFIC AND TRANSPORTATION DEPARTMENT

law.catch_line: Powers of Traffic Engineer assumed by Department.

text.section:
Sec. 2-96. Powers of Traffic Engineer assumed by Department.
In addition to the powers, duties, and functions hereinabove vested in the Traffic and Transportation Department, such Department shall have and exercise all powers conferred upon the County Traffic Engineer by the provisions of of this Code, not inconsistent with the provisions of this article.
